messages.title: Save Kingston Hospital
messages.content: It is really great that so many people are backing my campaign to save Accident and Emergency and Maternity services at Kingston Hospital.

messages.title: That's why we need a change in Wimbledon
messages.content: As your local MP, I will always put local people first - just as I have on the threats to Kingston Hospital. I will work harder than your local Tory.

mentions.partyLeader: Vince Cable, Susan Kramer and Edward Davey

issues.health: Campaign to save Accident and Emergency and Maternity services at Kingston Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am working with Lib Dem MPs Vince Cable, Susan Kramer and Edward Davey to fight the cuts.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to keep our NHS safe. We will prioritise spending to make sure frontline services are maintained and improved for people everywhere.
